mapper.select:
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board
order by bno asc
mapper.update: update tbl_board set viewcnt = viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
